title: Trading T213-3 Huggins for T213-2's.  No longer available.
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: Trading T213-3 Huggins for T213-2's.  No longer available.
posts.post_content:
Trade has been made.    :):):)


Hi, Although the chances are slim, I have a T213-3 Huggins that I would like to trade for any of the following:

T213-2's

Wiltse - New York - Pitching
Wiltse - Brooklyn - Pitching
Wiltse - Brooklyn - Portrait

Kelley - Toronto

Hoblitzell - Cincinnati
Hoblitzell - Boston Amer.
Hoblitzell - Boston Nat.

Elberfield - Chatanooga  (Elberfeld)

or a low grade Tango Eggs - any player

Raw is fine.  Graded is fine.  I prefer low grades, but not totally trashed.

Depending on the trade, I can add some money, or perhaps you can add some money, to even out the trade a little.  I am easy, so don't be afraid to make an offer.

Thanks much!  Rick

Wish you had a T213-3 Hal Chase! I have a Tango Eggs Hal Chase I would ba happy to trade. Oh well

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk
